Metadata.About: I am a 4th year Undergraduate student at IIIT Delhi, interested in all things related to Software Development and Cybersecurity

Terminal.question: afterchange.education
Terminal.answer: Indraprastha Institute of Information Technology, Delhi

work.title: Backend Intern
tasks: Discovered 4 unauthenticated endpoints with unsanitized input
Resolved 4 critical misconfigurations in company's AWS account
Created internal documentation related to SQL injection attacks and prevention mechanism
Worked on Logging Data Pipeline for Notification incase of system failures
Skills used: Python, AWS, ELK Stack, MongoDB

work.title: Undergraduate Reasearcher
tasks: Working in a team to utilize games as a medium for doing Real-Time Covert Communication (VoIP Calls)
Created various programs for embedding covert data through use of game mods
Successful in able to achieve real-time covert communication in more than 3 games
Skills used: C/C++, Low level programming, Operating Systems, Computer Networks

Projects.title: Parallel Runtime
Projects.description: Created 4 different parallel runtimes based on a stripped version of HCLib and Argobots

Projects.title: Distributed Systems
Projects.description: Implemented RAFT algorithm of size 5, with leader lease for linearizable reads. Also implement K-Means algorithm using MapReduce and gRPC, able to handle points in n-dimensions, and custom number of mappers and reducers

Projects.title: Delayma
Projects.description: ML Model to predict the delay of a flight based on various factors. Achieved an accuracy of 99% on the test set. Was selected as one of the best projects in the course.

Projects.title: Linux ACLs
Projects.description: A custom version of the Linux ACLs, with various methods to modify and retrive them, Also create other programs for creating files and directory which follow the custom ACLs, including a simple sudo program

Projects.title: Drugveda
Projects.description: A complete online pharmaceutical store, with a backend written in FastAPI and a frontend written in SvelteKit, and a SQL Database hosted on Linode. Also created a simple selenium script to scrape the website for data

Projects.title: This Website
Projects.description: This website, made using SvelteKit and TailwindCSS, and hosted on Github Pages
